abstract: Helen T Verongos reviews movie Papa: Hemingway in Cuba, directed by Bob Yari.
lead_paragraph: In Bob Yari’s autobiographical film, a young Miami journalist’s fan letter leads to a fishing trip and a long friendship with his literary hero.

headline.main: Review: ‘Papa: Hemingway in Cuba,’ a Mild Voyage With the Old Man and ‘the Kid’
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Papa: Hemingway in Cuba,’ a Mild Voyage With the Old Man and ‘the Kid’

snippet: In Bob Yari’s autobiographical film, a young Miami journalist’s fan letter leads to a fishing trip and a long friendship with his literary hero.
